verses.padam: iśhE| tvAq| UrjE| tvAq| vAqyavaH|̍ stha| upAqyava ityupa̍ - AqyavaH|̍ stha| dEvaH| vaH| savitA| prEti|̍ arpayatu| śrEśhThatamAqyEti̍ śrEśhTha# - tamAqya| karmaṇE|̍ Eti|̍ pyAqyadhvam| aGniyAqH| dEvaBAqgamiti# dEva- BAqgam| UrjasvatIH|̍ payasvatIH|̍ prajAvatIriti̍# prajA-vatIH| anamIvAH| ayakśhmAH| mA| vaH| stEnaH| Iśata| mA| aGaśaṃsa̍ ityaGa - śaṃqsaH| rudrasya|̍ hEtiH| parIti|̍ vaH| vRuṇaktu| dhruvAH| asminn| gOpatAqviti̍ gO -patau| syAqta| bahvIH| yajamAnasya|̍ paśUn| pAqhi| | 1 (iśhE - tricatvAriṃśat̍ )
verses.samhita: iśhE tvOrjE tvA# vAqyavaH̍ sthOpAqyavaH̍ stha dEvO vaH̍ savitA prArpayatu̍ śrEśhThatamAya̍ karmaṇa̍ A pyAyaddhvamaGniyA̍ dEvaBAqgamUrjasvatIH̍ payasvatIH̍ prajAvatIranamIvA̍ ayakśhmA̍ mA vaH̍ stEna Iśata̍ mA&GaśaṃsO̍ rudrasya# hEtiH pari# vO vRuṇaktu dhruvA asmin gOpatau̍ syAta bahvIr yajamAnasya̍ paśUn pAhi|̍ | 1 (iśhE - tricatvAriṃśat̍ ) (A1)

verses.padam: yajñasya|̍ GOśhat| asi| pratyuśhTamiti̍ prati# - uśhTam| rakśhaH|̍ pratyuśhTAq̍ iti prati# - uśhTAqH| arAtayaH|̍ prEti|̍ iyam| agAqt| dhiśhaṇA̱| baṛ qhiH| acCa|̍ manunA|̍ kRutA| svadhayEti# sva-dhayA̱| vitaśhTEti vi - taśhTAq| tE| Eti|̍ vahanti| kavayaH|̍ purastA̱t| dEvEByaH|̍ juśhTa̱m| iha| baṛ q. hiH| Aqsada ityA̱ - sadE̱| dEvAnA̱m| pariśhUtamiti# pari -sUtam| asi| vaṛ qśhavRuddhamiti̍# vaṛ qśha -vRuddham| asi| dEvabaṛ̍ hiriti dEva# - baṛ qhiH| mA| tvAq| anvak| mA| tiryak| parva|̍ tE| rAqdhyAqsam| AqcCEttEtyA̱ - CEttA| tE| mA| riśham| dEvabaṛ̍ hiriti dEva# -baṛ qhiH| śatavaḷ̍ śamiti# śata - vaḷ śam| vIti|̍ rOha| sahasravalśAq̍ iti# sahasra# -valśAqH| 2 (50)
verses.samhita: yajñasya# GOśhadasi̍ pratyuśhTaṃq̍ rakśhaH pratyuśhTAq̍ arAtayaH̍ prEyamagAddhiśhaṇA̍# barq. hiracCa manunA̍ kRutA svadhayAq vitaśhTAq̍ ta A vahanti̍ kavayaH̍ purastA̱d- dEvEByO juśhTamiha̍ barq. hirAqsadE# dEvAnA̱M pariśhUtamasi̍ varq. śhavRuddhamasi̍ dEvabaṛ̍ hirmA tvA&qnva~g mA tiryak parva# tE rAddhyAsamAcCEttA tE mA riśhaM̍ dEvabaṛ̍ hiH śatavaḷ̍ śaM ~Mvi rOha̍ sahasravaḷ̍ śAq - [ ] 2

verses.padam: vIti|̍ vayam| ruhEma| pRuthivyAH| saMpRuca iti# saM - pRucaH|̍ pAqhi| susaMBRutEti# su - saMBRutA̱| tvAq| samiti|̍ BarAqmi| adityai|̍ rAsnA̱| asi| indrAqṇyai| saMnahanamiti̍# saM - nahanam|̍ pUśhA| tE| granthim| grathnAqtu| saH| tE| mA| Eti|̍ sthAqt| indrasya|̍ tvAq| bAqhuByAqmiti# bAqhu-ByAqm| uditi|̍ yacCE| bRuhaspatE̱H| mUrdhnA| harAqmi| uru| antarikśham|̍ anviti|̍ ihi| dEva~ggamamiti# dEvam - gamam| asi| | 3 (38) (sahasravalśA̍ - aśhTAtriṃśacca)̍ (A2)
verses.samhita: vi vayaṃ ruhEma̍ pRuthivyAH saMpRucaH̍ pAhi susaMBRutA̱ tvAq saMBarAqmyadi̍tyai̍ rAsnA&sIndrAqṇyai̍ sannahanaM̍ pUśhA tE̱ granthiM grathnAtu̍ sa tE mA&& sthAqdindrasya̍ tvA bAqhuByAqmudyacCE̍ bRuhaspatE̱r mUrddhnA harAmyurva̍ntari̍kśhamanvi̍hi̍ dEvaMgamamasi|̍ | 3 (sahasravaḷ̍ śA - aśhTAtriṃśacca)̍ (A2)

verses.padam: śundhaddhvam|̍ daivyAya|̍ karmaṇE|̍ dEvayajyAyAq iti# dEva -yajyAyai̱| mAqtariśvanaH|̍ GarmaH| asi| dyauH| asi| pRuthivI| asi| viśvadhAyAq̍ iti# viśva -dhAqyAqH| asi| paramEṇa|̍ dhAmnA̱| dRuṃhasva|̍ mA| hvAqH| vasUnAm|̍ pavitra̱m| asi| śatadhAramiti̍# śata -dhAqram| vasUnAm|̍ pavitra̱m| asi| sahasradhAramiti̍# sahasra# - dhAqram| hutaH| stOkaH| hutaH| draPsaH| agnayE̱| bRuhatE| nAkAya|̍ svAhA̱| dyAvA# pRuthivIByAqmiti dyAvA̱ - pRuthivIByA̱m| sA| viśvAyuriti# viśva- AqyuH| sA| viśvavyacAq̍ iti# viśva -vyacAqH| sA| viśvakarmEti# viśva -karmAq| samiti|̍ pRucyaddhvam| RutAqvarIrityRuta̍ - varIH| UrmiṇI̱H| madhumattamAq̍ iti madhumat-tamAqH|̍ mandrAH| dhanasya|̍ sAqtayE̱| sOmEna̍ ( )| tvAq| Eti|̍ tanacmi| indrAya|̍ dadhi|̍ viśhṇO iti|̍ havyam| rakśhasva| | 4 (58)
verses.samhita: śundhaddhvaM̍ daivyAya̍ karmaṇE̍ dEvayajyAyai# mAtariśvanO̍ GarmO&si̍ dyaurasi̍ pRuthivyasi̍ viśvadhAyA̍ asi paramEṇa dhAmnAq dRuṃhasva̍ mA hvAqr vasUnAM̍ pavitramasi̍ śatadhAraM̍ ~MvasUnAM̍ pavitramasi̍ sahasradhAraṃ̍ hutaH stOkOhutO draPsO̱ &gnayE# bRuhatE nAkAya̍ svAhAq dyAvApRuthivIByAqṃq̍ sA viśvAyuH sA viśvavyacAqH̍ sA viśvakarmAq̍ saM pRucyaddhva-mRutAvarI-rUrmiṇIrmadhu̍mattamA̍ mandrA dhanasya̍ sAqtayE sOmEna̍ ( ) tvA&&tanacmIndrA̍ya̍ dadhi viśhṇO# havyaṃ rakśhasva|̍ | 4

verses.padam: karmaṇE|̍ vAqm| dEvEByaH|̍ śakEyam| vEśhAya|̍ tvAq| pratyuśhTamiti̍ prati# -uśhTam| rakśhaH|̍ pratyuśhTAq̍ iti prati# -uśhTAqH| arAtayaH|̍ dhUH| asi| dhUrva|̍ dhUrvantam|̍ dhUrva|̍ tam| yaH| asmAn| dhUrvati|̍ tam| dhUrva| yam| vayam| dhUrvAmaH|̍ tvam| dEvAnA̱m| asi| sasnitamamiti̍ sasni# - tamam| papritamamiti̍ papri# -tamam| juśhTatamamiti̍ juśhTa# - tamam| vahnitamamiti̍ vahni# - tamam| dEvahUtamamiti̍# dEva-hUtamam|̍ ahrutam|̍ asi| havirdhAnamiti# haviH - dhAna̱m| dRuṃhasva|̍ mA| hvAqH| mitrasya|̍ tvAq| cakśhuśhA|̍ prEti|̍ IkśhE| mA| BEH| mA| samiti|̍ vikthAq| mA| tvAq| 5 (50)
verses.samhita: karmaṇE̍ vAM dEvEByaH̍ śakEyaM ~MvEśhAya̍ tvAq pratyuśhTaṃq̍ rakśhaH pratyuśhTAq̍ arAtayO̍ dhUrasi̍ dhUrva dhUrvantaM̍ dhUrva taM ~MyO̱&smAn dhUrvati̍ taM dhU̱rvayaM ~MvayaM dhUrvAmastvaM̍ dEvAnAmasi̍ sasnitamaM̍ papritamaM̍ juśhTatamaM̍ ~MvahnitamaM̍ dEvahUtama-mahru̍tamasi̍ havirdhAnaM dRuṃhasva̍ mA hvA̱r mitrasya# tvAq cakśhuśhAq̍ prEkśhE mA BErmA saM ~MvikthAq̍ mA tvA# - [ ] 5

verses.samhita: hiṃsiśhamuru vAtAya̍ dEvasya# tvA savituH prasavE̱&śvinO̱r̍ bAqhuByA̱M pUśhṇO hastA̱ByA-magnayE juśhTaM nirvapAmyagnIśhOmA̱ByA-midaM̍ dEvAnAmidamu̍# naH saha sPAqtyai tvAq nArA̱tyai suvaraBi̍ vi KyEśhaM̍ ~MvaiśvAnaraM jyOtir dRuṃhantAqM̍ duryAq dyAvApRuthivyO-̍ rurvantari̍kśha̍ manvi-hyadityA̍ stvOpasthE# sAdayAqmyagnE# havyaṃ rakśhasva|̍ | 6 ( mA tvAq - śhaTcatvAriṃśacca̍ ) (A4)

verses.padam: dEvaH| vaH| savitA| uditi|̍ punAqtu| acCidrEṇa|̍ pavitrEṇa|̍ vasO̱H| sUryasya|̍ raśmiBiriti# raśmi - BiH| ApaH|̍ dEvIH| agrEpuva ityagrE̍ - puvaH| agrEguva ityagrE̍ - guvaH| agrE̱| imam| yajñam| nayata| agrE̱| yajñapatimiti̍# yajña - patim| dhatta| yuśhmAn| indraH|̍ avRuṇIta| vRutratUrya iti# vRutra -tUryE̱| yUyam| indra̱m| avRuṇIdhvam| vRutratUrya iti# vRutra -tUryE̱| prOkśhitAq̍ iti pra -ukśhitAqH| stha| agnayE̱| vaH| juśhTa̱m| prEti|̍ ukśhAqmi| agnIśhOmA̱ByAqmityagnI - sOmA̱ByAm| śundhadhvam|̍ daivyAya|̍ karmaṇE|̍ dEvayajyAyAq iti# dEva-yajyAyai̱| avadhUtamityava̍# - dhUtam| rakśhaH|̍ avadhUtAq̍ ityava# - dhUtAqH| arAtayaH|̍ adityAH|̍ tvak| asi| pratIti|̍ tvAq| 7 (50)
verses.samhita: dEvO vaH̍ savitOt punAqtvacCi̍drEṇa̍ pavitrEṇa̍ vasOH sUryasya̍ raśmiBirApO# dEvIragrEpuvO agrEguvO&gra# imaM ~MyajñaM nayatAgrE̍# yajñapatiM̍ dhatta yuśhmAnindrO# &vRuṇIta vRutratUryE# yUyamindra-mavRuṇIddhvaM̍ ~MvRutratUryE prOkśhitAH̍ sthAqgnayE# vO juśhTaM prOkśhA̱myagnIśhOmA̱ByAqṃq śundhaddhvaM̍ daivyAya̍ karmaṇE̍ dEvayajyAyAq avadhUtaṃq̍ rakśhO&vadhUtAq̍ arAtayO&di̍tyAqstvaga̍si̍ prati# tvA - [ ] 7

verses.padam: pRuthivI| vEttu| adhiśhavaṇamitya̍dhi̍ - savanam|̍ asi| vAqnaspatyam| pratIti|̍ tvAq| adityAH|̍ tvak| vEttu| agnEH| tanUH| asi| vAqcaH| visarjanamiti̍# vi-sarjanam|̍ dEvavItaya̍ iti# dEva- vItayE| tvAq| gRuhṇAqmi| adriH|̍ asi| vAqnaspatyaH| saH| idam| dEvEByaH|̍ havyam| suśamIti# su- śami|̍ śamiśhva| iśha̱m| Eti|̍ vada| Urja̱m| Eti|̍ vada| dyumaditi# dyu-mat| vadata| vayam| sa~gGAqtamiti# saM - GAqtam| jEśhma| vaṛ qśhavRuddhamiti̍# vaṛ qśha -vRuddham| asi| pratIti|̍ tvAq| vaṛ qśhavRuddhamiti̍# vaṛ qśha -vRuddham| vEttu| parApUtamiti̍ parA̱ - pUtam| rakśhaH|̍ parApUtAq̍ iti parA̱ - pUtAqH| arAtayaH|̍ rakśhasAm|̍ BAqgaH ( )| asi| vAqyuH| vaH| vIti|̍ vinaktu| dEvaH| vaH| savitA| hiraṇyapAṇiriti̍ hiraṇya̍ - pAqṇiH| pratIti|̍ gRuhṇAqtu| | 8 (61)
verses.samhita: pRuthivI vE̱ttvadhiśhavaṇamasi̍ vAnaspatyaM prati tvA&dityAqstvagvE̱ttvagnEstanUra̍si̍ vAqcO visarjanaM̍ dEvavItayE̍ tvA gRuhṇAqmyadrirasi̍ vAnaspatyaH sa idaM dEvEByO# havyaṃ suśami# śamiśhvEśhamA vadOrjamA vada̍ dyumadvadata̍ vayaṃ saMGAqtaM̍ jE̱śhma varq. śhavRuddhamasi̍ prati# tvA varq. śhavRuddhaM̍ ~MvEttu parApUtaṃq̍ rakśhaH parApUtAq̍ arAtayO̍ rakśhasAM̍ BAqgO# ( ) &si vAqyurvO vi vinaktu̍ dEvO vaH̍ savitA hiraṇyapAṇiH̍ prati# gRuhṇAtu| | 8

verses.padam: avadhUtamityava̍# - dhUtam| rakśhaH|̍ avadhUtAq̍ ityava# - dhUtAqH| arAtayaH|̍ adityAH|̍ tvak| asi| pratIti|̍ tvAq| pRuthivI| vEttu| divaH| skamBaniH| asi| pratIti|̍ tvAq| adityAH|̍ tvak| vEttu| dhiśhaṇA̱| asi| parvatyA| pratIti|̍ tvAq| divaH| skamBaniH| vEttu| dhiśhaṇA̱| asi| pAqrvatEyI| pratIti|̍ tvAq| parvatiH| vEttu| dEvasya|̍ tvAq| savituH| prasava iti# pra -savE| aśvinO̱H| bAqhuByAqmiti# bAqhu-ByAqm| pUśhṇaH| hastA̱ByAm| adhIti|̍ vapAqmi| dhAqnya̱m| asi| dhinuhi| dEvAn| prAqṇAyEti# pra-anAya|̍ tvAq ( )| apAqnAtyEpa̍ -anAya|̍ tvAq| vyAqnAyEti# vi- anAya|̍ tvAq| dIrGAm| anviti|̍ prasitimiti̍ pra - sitim| AyuśhE|̍ dhAqm| dEvaH| vaH| savitA| hiraṇyapAṇiriti̍ hiraṇya̍ - pAqṇiH| pratIti|̍ gRuhṇAqtu| | 9 (65)
verses.samhita: avadhUtaṃq̍ rakśhO&vadhUtAq̍ arAtayO&di̍tyAqstvaga̍si̍ prati# tvA pRuthivIvE̱ttu divaH skaMBanira̍si̍ prati tvA&dityAqstvagvE̱ttu̍ dhiśhaṇA&si̍ parvatyA prati# tvA divaH skaMBanirvE̱ttu̍ dhiśhaṇA&si̍ pArvatEyI prati# tvA parvatirvE̱ttu dEvasya# tvA savituH prasavE̱-&śvinO̱r̍ bAqhuByA̱M pUśhṇOhastA̱ByAqmadhi# vapAmidhAqnyamasi̍ dhinuhi dEvAn prAqṇAya# tvA ( ) &pAqnAya# tvA vyAqnAya# tvA dIrGAmanu prasitimAyu̍śhEdhAM̍ dEvO vaH̍ savitA hiraṇyapAṇiH̍ prati# gRuhṇAtu| | 9

verses.padam: dhRuśhTiH|̍ asi| brahma|̍ yacCa| apEti|̍ agnE| agnim| AqmAdamityAma̍ -ada̱m| jahi| niriti|̍ kravyAdamiti# kravya- ada̱m| sEdha| Eti|̍ dEvayajamiti# dEva-yaja̱m| vaha| nirdagdhamiti̍ niH - dagdham| rakśhaH|̍ nirdagdhAq̍ iti niH - dagdhAqH| arAtayaH|̍ dhruvam| asi| pRuthivIm| dRuṃqha| AyuH|̍ dRuṃqha| prajAmiti# pra -jAm| dRuṃqha| sajAqtAniti# sa-jAqtAn| asmai| yajamAnAya|̍ parIti|̍ Uha| dhartram| asi| antarikśham|̍ dRuṃqha| prAqṇamiti# pra- anam| dRuṃqha| AqpAqnamityapa̍ - anam| dRuṃqha| sajAqtAniti# sa-jAqtAn| asmai| yajamAnAya|̍ parIti|̍ Uha| dharuṇa̱m| asi| diva̱m| dRuṃqha| cakśhuH|̍ 10 (50)
verses.samhita: dhRuśhTirasi̍ brahma# yacCApA̱gnE &gnimAqmAdaM̍ jahi niśhkravyAdaṃ# sEdhA&&dEvayaja̍M̍ ~Mvaha nirdagdhaṃq̍ rakśhO nirdagdhAq̍ arAtayO̍ dhruvamasi̍ pRuthivIM dRuṃqhA&&*yur̍ dRuṃha prajAM dRuṃha̍ sajAqtAnasmai yajamAnAya̍ paryUha̍ dhartramasyantari̍kśhaM̍ dRuṃha prAqṇaM dRuṃhApAqnaM̍ dRuṃha̍ sajAqtAnasmai yajamAnAya̍ paryUha̍ dharuṇamasi̍ divaM̍ dRuṃha cakśhur-̍ [ ] 10

verses.padam: dRuṃqha| śrOtra̱m| dRuṃqha| sajAqtAniti# sa-jAqtAn| asmai| yajamAnAya|̍ parIti|̍ Uha| dharma|̍ asi| diśaH|̍ dRuṃqha| yOni̱m| dRuṃqha| prajAmiti# pra -jAm| dRuṃqha| sajAqtAniti# sa-jAqtAn| asmai| yajamAnAya|̍ parIti|̍ Uha| citaH|̍ stha| prajAmiti# pra -jAm| asmai| rayim| asmai| sajAqtAniti# sa-jAqtAn| asmai| yajamAnAya|̍ parIti|̍ Uha| BRugUṇAm|̍ a~ggirasAm|̍ tapasA|̍ tapyadhvam| yAni|̍ GarmE| kapAlAni|̍ upacinvantItyupa̍ - cinvanti|̍ vEdhasaH|̍ | pUśhṇaH| tAni|̍ apIti|̍ vratE| indravAqyU itI̱ndra-vAyU| vIti|̍ mu~jcatAqm| | 11 (48) (cakśhu# - raśhTAcatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A7)
